metadata.Title: CVE-2016-9073 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
WebExtensions can bypass security checks to load privileged URLs andpotentially escape the WebExtension sandbox. This vulnerability affectsFirefox < 50.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-9073` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
firefox-globalmenu - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
firefox-mozsymbols - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
firefox-testsuite - 50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: firefox package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '50.0+build2-0ubuntu0.14.04.2').
